attributes.action: Creation of a legally protected, anonymous to call, crime advice line for anyone who has or is thinking of commiting a crime.
attributes.additional_details:
The Crime Frontiers’ UK Government  Petition
We call upon the UK Government to make it possible; to allow the creation of  a government authorised, but independently run, legally protected, anonymous to call, crime advice line, for anyone (including concerned family and friends) who has or is thinking of committing a crime.
Any adviser/negotiator taking part in any such advice session, must be legally protected; against any criminal or civil prosecution, for refusing to disclose any details; about the caller or the crime, to any outside body, including the police or any past or intended victims of the crime.
From: Crimefrontiers.com
